H0.text: under what political system does the united states government operate. Democracy

H1.text: under what political system does the united states government operate. Federalism

H2.text: under what political system does the united states government operate. Constitutionalism

H3.text: under what political system does the united states government operate. Republic

A4.text: The United States is a republic, as its government was created by the ratification of the current U.S. Constitution, creating a union that was a republic.

A5.text: The indirect election of the president through the electoral college conforms to the concept of the republic as one with a system of indirect election.
